name: 360 Product Detait View
author: MINH TUAN NGUYEN

sections.description:
Required: Woocommerce.

FEATURES

  • Help your customers easy see your product in 360 degrees
  • Grow your business
  • Work with WooCommerce
  • Friendly
  • Be easy to use and customize

Thank you, @gauravjassal for making an amazing 360 library.
sections.installation:
Manual installation is easy and takes fewer than one minute.

  1. Download the plugin from wordpress.org, unpack it and upload the [360 product view] folder to your wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins‘ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to your main Production Detail, and configure the basic options (total frames, frame, display, etc);
  4. You need to upload 52 frames of your product to get smooth 360 view.

You’re done. Enjoy.

short_description: Running an eCommerce site with WooCommerce? This WordPress plugin will allow you help your customers can see your beautiful product in 360 degrees.
